JOLCLIST.text:
PROC 0         PI(PI) PM(NPM) PJ(PJ) PE(NPE) JCLRDR(NOSRDR)   +
      LET(LET) SYMS()  ACCOUNT() PGM($JOLCP35) +
       LIB(JOL60.LOAD) JOLSRCE(JOL60.INCLUDE) +
       JOLCMD(JOL60.CMDLIB) +
       INCL('&SYSPREF..JOL.JOL') MACRO('&SYSPREF..JOL.JOL')   +
       LOAD('JOL60.LOAD')            DSN() MEMB() FREE   +
       SUB SUBMIT LIST MSGOFF
 CONTROL          MSG NOFLUSH PROMPT
 IF &LIST = LIST THEN CONTROL LIST CONLIST
 ATTN           DO
       CONTROL NOMSG NOFLUSH
       FREE F($$A $$B +
              $$JPRINT $$JCL $$JWORK1 $$JWORK2 +
              $$JLOAD $$JINCL $$JMACRO $$JIN)
       CONTROL MSG NOFLUSH
       EXIT
       END
 SET &NULL =
 IF &FREE = FREE +
  OR           '&INCL' ¬= '&SYSPREF..JOL.JOL' +
  OR           '&MACRO'¬= '&SYSPREF..JOL.JOL' +
  OR           '&LOAD' ¬= 'JOL60.LOAD'  +
  THEN DO
       CONTROL NOMSG
       FREE FI($$JPRINT $$JCL $$JWORK1 $$JWORK2)
       FREE FI($$JLOAD $$JIN $$JINCL $$JMACRO)
       CONTROL MSG
       END
 CALL '&LIB.($TESTJCL)'
 IF &LASTCC=0 THEN GOTO RERUN
 ALQUICK: +
 IF &MSGOFF ¬= MSGOFF THEN +
  WRITE +
 >> JOL           BEGINNING TSO ALLOCATION AT &SYSTIME  ON  &SYSDATE
 ALLOC F($$A) DA('&SYSUID..$$JPRINT.DATA') +
 MOD SP(1 1) TRACK BLKSIZE(1330)
 ALLOC F($$B) DA('&SYSUID..$$JCL.DATA') MOD SP(1 1) TRACK BLKSIZE(3120)
 ALLOC FI($$JPRINT) DA('&SYSUID..$$JPRINT.DATA') OLD BLKSIZE(1330)
 ALLOC FI($$JCL) DA('&SYSUID..$$JCL.DATA') OLD BLKSIZE(3120)
 ALLOC FI($$JWORK1) BLKSIZE(800) SP(10 10) ROUND
 ALLOC FI($$JWORK2) BLKSIZE(800) SP(10 10) ROUND
 CONTROL NOMSG
 FREE FI(SYSTERM $$A $$B)
 CONTROL MSG
 ALLOC FI(SYSTERM) DA(*)
 ALLOC FI($$JLOAD) DA('&LOAD.' '&LIB.') SHR
 ALLOC FI($$JINCL)         DA('&INCL.'         '&JOLSRCE.')  SHR
 ALLOC FI($$JMACRO) +
 DA('&MACRO.'         '&JOLCMD.' ) SHR
 IF &MSGOFF ¬= MSGOFF +
  THEN DO
 WRITE >> '&SYSUID..$$JPRINT.DATA' AND '&SYSUID..$$JCL.DATA' ALLOCATED
 WRITE >> '&SYSPREF..JOL.JOL' ALLOCATED AS INCLUDE AND MACRO LIBRARY
  END
 RERUN: ATTN EXIT
      CONTROL NOMSG
      FREE F($$JIN)
      CONTROL MSG
      IF &DSN           ¬= &NULL +
         THEN DO
              ALLOC F($$JIN) DA('&DSN') SHR
              GOTO JOLEX
              END
      IF &STR(&MEMB) = &STR(*) THEN GOTO JOLENT
      IF &MEMB ¬= &NULL +
         THEN DO
              ALLOC F($$JIN) DA(JOL.JOL(&MEMB)) SHR
              GOTO JOLEX
              END
 AGN: ATTN EXIT
    WRITE >> ENTER A MEMBER NAME OF YOUR JOL DATASET OR AN *
    READ &ANS
    WRITE >> JOL EXECUTING
    CONTROL NOMSG
    FREE F($$JIN)
    CONTROL MSG
    IF &STR(&ANS)           = &STR(*) THEN GOTO JOLENT
    ALLOC F($$JIN) DA(JOL.JOL(&ANS)) SHR
    GOTO JOLEX
 JOLENT: +
    ALLOC FILE($$JIN) DA(*)
    WRITE >> ENTER JOL STATEMENTS ENDING WITH /*
 JOLEX: +
 CALL '&LIB.(&PGM.)' +
    'TEST &JCLRDR. &PI. &PM. &PE. &PJ. &LET. /+
    SYSACCT=&ACCOUNT,+
    SYSUID=&SYSUID.,SYSPREF=&SYSPREF.,TSOCLASS=X,&SYMS.'
 SET RETCODE = &LASTCC
 IF &SUB = SUB OR &SUBMIT = SUBMIT +
  THEN DO
       IF &RETCODE <= 4 THEN SUBMIT '&SYSUID..$$JCL.DATA'
      ELSE WRITE >> JOL ERRORS - JOB NOT SUBMITTED - LASTCC = &RETCODE
       END
 ELSE DO
    WRITENR +
    >> ENTER OPTION SUB JOL JCL MORE OR END (HIT ENTER TO TERMINATE)
    READ &ANS
       DO WHILE &ANS ¬= END AND &ANS ¬=
       IF &ANS = MORE THEN GOTO AGN
       IF &ANS = SUB THEN SUBMIT '&SYSUID..$$JCL.DATA'
       IF &ANS = JCL THEN LIST '&SYSUID..$$JCL.DATA' NONUM
       IF &ANS = JOL THEN LIST '&SYSUID..$$JPRINT.DATA' NONUM
       WRITENR +
     >> ENTER OPTION SUB JOL JCL MORE OR END (HIT ENTER TO TERMINATE)
       READ &ANS
       END
    END
EXIT: EXIT CODE(&RETCODE)

MVSJOB3.text:
//CLARKE3 JOB (0000,0000),NAME,NOTIFY=USER,REGION=1024K, <<<==========
// MSGCLASS=X TYPRUN=SCAN
//JOLGEN  PROC SOUT='*',                <<<======================
//             INDEX='SYS2.'            <<<=====================
//*
//**     N O T E
//*
//*    YOU MUST ALTER THE INDEX PARAMETER ABOVE TO BE THE HIGH LEVEL
//*      INDEX YOU REQUIRE.
//*
//********************************************
//* JOL GENERATION ASSEMBLY
//********************************************
//ASM      EXEC PGM=ASMBLR,PARM='LIST,NODECK,OBJ'
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=SYS2.LINKLIB,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=SYS1.LINKLIB,DISP=SHR,VOL=SER=JOL53,UNIT=3380
//*STEPLIB  DD  DSN=IFOXLOAD,DISP=SHR
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT
//SYSLIB   DD DSN=&INDEX.JOL60.SOURCE,DISP=SHR                 J60
//SYSUT1   DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
//SYSUT2   DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
//SYSUT3   DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
//SYSGO    DD DSN=&&OBJ,DISP=(,PASS),SPACE=(TRK,(5,5)),
//         UNIT=SYSDA,DCB=BLKSIZE=400
//SYSIN    DD DSN=&INDEX.JOL60.SOURCE(JOLSYSG),DISP=SHR
//************************************************
//* LINK JOLGEN DETAILS
//************************************************
//LKED     EXEC PGM=IEWL,PARM='LIST,MAP'
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT
//SYSLMOD  DD DSN=&INDEX.JOL60.LOAD(UJGENDET),DISP=SHR =============<
//SYSUT1   DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,1)
//SYSLIN   DD DSN=&&OBJ,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
// PEND
// EXEC JOLGEN
//ASM.SYSIN    DD  DSN=JOLDIST.JOL60.SOURCE(JOLSYSG),DISP=SHR
//         DD  *
*
**********************************************************************
*
*         J O L D E F       M A C R O
*
**********************************************************************
*
     JOLDEF    CARD1=,              UP TO 3 DD CARDS MAY BE SPECIFIED. *
               CARD2=,              THESE WILL BE OUTPUT EACH TIME JOL *
               CARD3=,              GENERATES A NEW OS JOB STEP.       *
               CLASS=,              DEFAULT CLASS PARA IN JOB CARD     *
               CPU=,                DEFAULT CPU TIME IN JOB CARD       *
               DEFDISK=SYSDA,       DEF UNIT FOR NON-SEQ O/P DATASETS  *
               DEFTAPE=SYSDA,       DEF UNIT FOR NON-TEMP SEQ O/P DATA *
               DUMP=,               ANY VALID SYSUDUMP DD STATEMENT    *
               ELAP=,               DEFAULT ELAPSE TIME ON JOB CARD    *
               ERRSEV=0,            LEVEL OF ERROR MESS. PRINTED (0-5) *
               FLAG=0,              END OF COL. FOR SOURCE CODE (0-73) *
               GDGDCB=JOLDCB,       CATALOG'D DATASET FOR DSET CREATION*
               JOBREGN=,            DEFAULT JOB REGION SIZE            *
               LINECNT=57,          MAX NUM LINES PER PAGE OF COMP LIST*
               MAXNAME=400,         MAX NUM OF DSID/PGM/MACRO NAMES.   *
               MAXSYM=500,          MAX NUM OF SYMBOLICS.              *
               MAXSYMV=9000,        AMOUNT OF VIRT STOR ALLOC FOR SYMS.*
               OUTDEFS=(,,,5,2,T),                                     *
               TITLE='         * * *    J O L    * * *    D E M O N S T*
               R A T I O N   S Y S T E M',                             *
               PE=NO,               PRINT EXPANDED MACRO INSTRUCTIONS  *
               PI=YES,              PRINT INCLUDED JOL STATEMENTS      *
               PJ=NO,               PRINT GENERATED JCL                *
               PM=NO,               PRINT INTERPRETED MACROS           *
               PO=NO,               PRINT JOL OPTIONS, STATISTICS      *
               PRINT=YES,           PRINT A JOL LISTING                *
               PRNTALL=YES,         PRINT JCL ALLOCATION MESSAGES      *
               PRNTJCL=YES,         PRINT JCL AT RUN TIME (MSGLEVEL=1) *
               PRTY=,               DEFAULT JOB PRIORITY               *
               PUNCHCL=B,           USED FOR SYSOUT CLASS FOR PUNCH DS *
               SM=(1,72,00),        SOURCE MARGINS FOR JOL STATEMENTS  *
               SPCFORM=S,           SPECIAL FORMS (1 ALPHA CHAR)       *
               SPOOL=JES2,          SPEC. WHAT SYSTEM WILL DO SPOOLING *
               SYSBLK=800,          DEFAULT BLOCK SIZE ON O/P DSID'S   *
               SYSCLAS=A,           DEFAULT SYSOUT CLASS FOR NON TSS   *
               SYSDEFS=,            DEFAULTS FOR PRINT FILES           *
               SYSTEM=MVS,          O/SYSTEM UNDER WHICH JOL WILL RUN  *
               TSOCLAS=X            DEFAULT MSGCLASS FOR TSS JOBS
*
**********************************************************************
*
*         D E F U N I T       M A C R O
*
**********************************************************************
*
*
* CODE HERE THE KEYWORDS:-
*     P2314, P3330, P3340, P3350 ETC
*           FOLLOWED BY JOL UNIT NAMES, INSTALLATION UNIT NAMES.
*    (THESE NAMES ARE FOR PERMANENTLY MOUNTED VOLUMES ON YOUR SYSTEM)
* THEN
*     D2314, D3330, D3340, D3350 ETC
*           FOLLOWED BY JOL UNIT NAMES, INSTALLATION UNIT NAMES.
*    (THESE NAMES ARE FOR DISMOUNTABLE UNITS ON YOUR SYSTEM)
* THEN
*     T34001, T34002, T34003, ETC
*           FOLLOWED BY JOL UNIT NAMES, INSTALLATION UNIT NAMES.
*    (THESE NAMES ARE FOR TAPE UNITS ON YOUR SYSTEM)
*
* SEE THE JOL INSTALLATION GUIDE FOR FURTHER DETAILS.
*
           DEFUNIT P3380=(DISK,DISK,SYSDA,SYSDA,SYSSQ,SYSSQ,   *********
               TSTORE,DISK,STORAGE,DISK),                      *********
               P3390=(3390,3390),                              *********
               T24003=(TAPE,TAPE,T6250,T6250)
*
**********************************************************************
*
*         V O L S T A R T      M A C R O
*
**********************************************************************
*
* CODE HERE ALL THE INSTALLATION VOLUME NAMES THAT ARE PERMANENTLY
*   MOUNTED. SEE THE JOL INSTALLATION MANUAL FOR FURTHER DETAILS.
*
*
           VOLSTART
*
           P2314 (SORT00,SORT01,SORT02,SORT03,SORT04,SORT05)
           P3330 (WORK01,SPOOL0,SPOOL1)
           P3340 (PAGE00,PAGE01)
           P3350 (MVSRES,MVSDLB,PUB000,PUB001,PROD01,EXAMPL,OF_AN_,    *
               EXTEND,ED_LIN)
           P3380 (JOL53,JOL60)
           P3390 (SARES1,SARES1)
*
           VOLEND
*
*
*
**********************************************************************
*
*         S W A P U N I T      M A C R O
*
**********************************************************************
*
* IF YOU WISH TO CHANGE ANY UNIT NAMES THAT THE JOL USER CODED TO
*   INSTALLATION STANDARDS, CODE THE UNIT NAME SPECIFIED IN THE
* JOL PROGRAM, FOLLOWED BY THE INSTALLATION STANDARD UNIT NAME.
*
* SEE THE JOL INSTALLATION GUIDE FOR FURTHER DETAILS.
*
*
           SWAPUNIT (MASS,3390)
*
*
**********************************************************************
*
*         J O L E N D        M A C R O
*
**********************************************************************
*
             JOLEND
             END
//

MVSJOB3N.text:
//MVSJOB3 JOB (0000,0000),NAME,NOTIFY=USER,REGION=1024K, <<<==========
// MSGCLASS=X TYPRUN=SCAN
//JOLGEN  PROC SOUT='*',                <<<======================
//             INDEX='SYS2.'            <<<=====================
//*
//**     N O T E
//*
//*    YOU MUST ALTER THE INDEX PARAMETER ABOVE TO BE THE HIGH LEVEL
//*      INDEX YOU REQUIRE.
//*
//********************************************
//* JOL GENERATION ASSEMBLY
//********************************************
//ASM  EXEC PGM=ASMBLR,PARM='LIST,NODECK,OBJ'
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT
//SYSUT1 DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
//SYSUT2 DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
//SYSUT3 DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
//SYSGO  DD DSN=&&OBJ,DISP=(,PASS),SPACE=(TRK,(5,5)),
//       UNIT=SYSDA,DCB=BLKSIZE=400
//SYSIN DD  DSN=&INDEX.JOL60.SOURCE(JOLSYSG),DISP=SHR
//************************************************
//* LINK JOLGEN DETAILS
//************************************************
//LKED EXEC PGM=IEWL,PARM='LIST,MAP'
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT
//SYSLMOD  DD DSN=&INDEX.JOL60.LOAD(UJGENDET),DISP=SHR =============<
//SYSUT1 DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,1)
//SYSLIN DD  DSN=&&OBJ,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
// PEND
// EXEC JOLGEN
//SYSIN DD
//      DD  *
*
**********************************************************************
*
*         J O L D E F       M A C R O
*
**********************************************************************
*
      JOLDEF   CARD1=,       { PLACE ANY JCL CARDS TO BE          75128*
               CARD2=,      {  GENERATED FOR ALL STEPS            75128*
               CARD3=,       { HERE                               75128*
               CLASS=,            DEFAULT JOB CLASS               82200*
               DEFDISK=SYSDA,     DEFAULT DISK UNIT               74303*
               DEFTAPE=SYSDA,     DEFAULT TAPE UNIT               74303*
               DUMP=,             JCL CARD FOR SYSUDUMP                *
               ELAP=,             DEFAULT ELAPSED TIME FOR JES2   82200*
               ERRSEV=0,          0=LIST ALL WARNINGS ETC              *
               FLAG=0,                                                 *
               GDGDCB=JOLDCB,     DEFAULT DCB FOR OUTPUT GDGS          *
               JOBREGN=,          DEFAULT JOB REGION              82200*
               LINECNT=57,        LINES/PAGE FOR COMPILER LISTINGS75128*
               MON=BATCH,         *** FOR FUTURE IMPLEMENTATION **76200*
               MAXNAME=400,       MAX DSIDS,PROGRAMS ETC               *
               MAXSYM=500,        MAX NUMBER OF SYMBOLIC NAMES         *
               MAXSYSV=9000,      MAX SPACE FOR STORING SYMBOLIC VALUES*
               OUTDEFS=(,,,5,2,T), SEE SYS PROG GUIDE             82200*
               OWNER='         * * *    J O L    * * *    D E M O N S T*
                R A T I O N   S Y S T E M',                            *
               PE=NO,             PRINT MACRO EXPANSIONS - YES OR NO   *
               PI=YES,            PRINT INCLUDED MEMBERS - YES OR NO   *
               PJ=NO,             PRINT GENERATED JCL    - YES OR NO   *
               PM=NO,             PRINT INTERPRETING MACROS - YES OR NO*
               PO=NO,             PRINT OPTIONS          - YES OR NO   *
               PRINT=YES,         PRODUCE JOL COMPILER LIST - YES OR NO*
               PRNTALL=YES,       MSGLEVEL=(,1)                        *
               PRNTJCL=YES,       MSGLEVEL=(1)                         *
               PRTY=,             DEFAULT PRTY                    82200*
               PUNCHCL=B,         SYSOUT CLASS FOR PUNCH DATA SETS     *
               REALJCL=NO,        *** NOT YET IMPLEMENTED ***          *
               SCHED=$JOLMN60,    *** ALTER WITH CAUTION ******   76200*
               SM=(1,72,00),      SOURCE MARGINS                  75128*
               SPCFORM=S,         THIS CHARACTER PRECEEDS FORM NUMBER  *
               SPOOL=2,           JES2                                 *
               SRDR=NO,           DON'T ATTEMPT TO START A SPECIAL RDR *
               SVC=13,            VS1 ONLY                        76200*
               SYSBLK=800,        BLOCK SIZE OF 'CARD FILES'      75128*
               SYSCLAS=A,         DEFAULT SYSOUT CLASS IF NONE CODED   *
               SYSDEFS=,          SEE SYSTEM PROGRAMMER GUIDE     82200*
               SYSTEM=MVS,        DEFAULT SYSTEM JOB TO RUN ON         *
               TSOCLAS=X,         DEFAULT SYSOUT IF RUN UNDER TSO      *
               TYPE=CSECT                                         75128
*
**********************************************************************
*
*         D E F U N I T       M A C R O
*
**********************************************************************
*
*
* CODE HERE THE KEYWORDS:-
*     P2314, P3330, P3340, P3350 ETC
*           FOLLOWED BY JOL UNIT NAMES, INSTALLATION UNIT NAMES.
*    (THESE NAMES ARE FOR PERMANENTLY MOUNTED VOLUMES ON YOUR SYSTEM)
* THEN
*     D2314, D3330, D3340, D3350 ETC
*           FOLLOWED BY JOL UNIT NAMES, INSTALLATION UNIT NAMES.
*    (THESE NAMES ARE FOR DISMOUNTABLE UNITS ON YOUR SYSTEM)
* THEN
*     T34001, T34002, T34003, ETC
*           FOLLOWED BY JOL UNIT NAMES, INSTALLATION UNIT NAMES.
*    (THESE NAMES ARE FOR TAPE UNITS ON YOUR SYSTEM)
*
* SEE THE JOL INSTALLATION GUIDE FOR FURTHER DETAILS.
*
           DEFUNIT P3330=(DISK,DISK,SYSDA,SYSDA,SYSSQ,SYSSQ,   *********
               TSTORE,DISK,STORAGE,DISK),                      *********
               T24003=(TAPE,TAPE,T6250,T6250)
*
**********************************************************************
*
*         V O L S T A R T      M A C R O
*
**********************************************************************
*
* CODE HERE ALL THE INSTALLATION VOLUME NAMES THAT ARE PERMANENTLY
*   MOUNTED. SEE THE JOL INSTALLATION MANUAL FOR FURTHER DETAILS.
*
*
           VOLSTART
*
           P3350 (SYSRES,DISCAT,SPL002,TEST02,PROD01,SYSLIB,WORK1A,    *
               WORK2A,WORK3A)
*
           VOLEND
*
*
*
**********************************************************************
*
*         S W A P U N I T      M A C R O
*
**********************************************************************
*
* IF YOU WISH TO CHANGE ANY UNIT NAMES THAT THE JOL USER CODED TO
*   INSTALLATION STANDARDS, CODE THE UNIT NAME SPECIFIED IN THE
* JOL PROGRAM, FOLLOWED BY THE INSTALLATION STANDARD UNIT NAME.
*
* SEE THE JOL INSTALLATION GUIDE FOR FURTHER DETAILS.
*
*
           SWAPUNIT (MASS,3330V)
*
*
**********************************************************************
*
*         J O L E N D        M A C R O
*
**********************************************************************
*
             JOLEND
             END
//
